hadiths.text: Hafsah, the wife of the Prophet (S), narrated:"I did not see Allah's Messenger (S) praying voluntary prayers sitting until the year before he died. Then he would perform Salat for the voluntary prayers sitting, and he would recite a Surah and prolong it such that it would be longer than the longest of them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَتَطَوَّعُ جَالِسًا
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Voluntary Prayers While Sitting
